definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The magnet is usually made in the shape of horseshoe so that it will be as strong as possible.
sentences.chinese: 磁鐵通常是做成馬蹄形的，以便使其磁性儘可能地強。

sentences.english: The formation and development of these horseshoe vortices were studied and compared.
sentences.chinese: 對這四種馬蹄形渦的形成及發展進行了研究和比較。

sentences.english: Her glance swept the horse-shoe curve of boxes.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光掃視着那些馬蹄形排列的包廂。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical value of modified incision and thread-drawing in the treatment of horseshoe anal fistula.
sentences.chinese: 探討改良切開掛線術治療馬蹄形肛瘻的臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: Th is is the difference between the actual performance of the CIE diagram, you can clear the domain.
sentences.chinese: 這個不同在CIE的馬蹄形色域圖上可以澄輝看不入。

sentences.english: The teacher bends a piece of iron into a horseshoe.
sentences.chinese: 這位教師把一塊鐵彎曲成馬蹄形。

sentences.english: The site is situated on a horse shoe shaped island and faces north and east.
sentences.chinese: 住宅所在場地位於一個馬蹄形的島嶼上，朝北朝東。

sentences.english: Stress distributions along the periphery of horse hoof-shaped tunnel lining were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 計算了馬蹄形隧洞襯砌周邊的應力分佈。

sentences.english: The water cuts the alluvial banks of the "lower" river into deep horseshoe curves.
sentences.chinese: 河水把下游那些沖積的河岸衝成很深的馬蹄形曲線。

sentences.english: Its horseshoe-shaped grill is still remembered today.
sentences.chinese: 其馬蹄形散熱護柵到今天仍被懷念。

definition: banner/standard/variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
